殀字的基本解释

殀
yāo
同“夭”②。

殀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎo］
［《廣韻》於兆切，上小，影。］
(1)短命而死。
(2)杀死。

殀字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殀； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页579第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】於兆切【正韻】伊鳥切，?音夭。【玉篇】歿也。短折曰殀，壽之反也。【孟子】殀壽不貳。亦作夭。　又斷殺也。【禮·王制】不殺胎，不殀夭。【鄭註】殀，斷殺也。少長曰夭。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　yao; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 579 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Yu Zhaoqie [Zheng Yun] Yi Niaoqie,? Yinyao. [Jade articles] also died. The short break is called Yao, but the opposite is true of longevity. [Mencius] Younger life is not two. Also as Yao.　 Kill again. [Rite · King System] Do not kill the fetus, do not Yaoyao. [Zheng's Note] Yao, kill it. Shao Chang said Yao.
